Description:
MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
• Excellent communication skills including public-speaking, training 10-20 people in a session, technical writing, and evaluation.• Excellent computer skills including the use of Microsoft Office Suite and the ability to learn various systems including OneNote and Adobe products.• Experience in an industrial setting such as mining, oil and gas, power generation, aerospace, construction, railroad, shipbuilding, etc.
• Experience in conducting or overseeing scaffolding erection, dismantling and modification activities.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
• Associate or bachelor's degree in an industrial, technical, or related field.
• More than 5 years of training or teaching experience.
• CISRS or CITB certifications for scaffolding Programs.
• TTT.ATTRIBUTES• Life-long learner
• Humble and teachable
• Enthusiastic & a great communicator
• Team-Oriented
• High Level of Integrity
• Self-MotivatedJob Details
